name: Weed Wacker Warrior
description:
This demo is a brief test of an upcoming game being developed called Weed Wacker Warrior. The game follows two friends working a menial summer job when all of a sudden their life gets turned upside down and they then have to fight an ever expanding army of weed based enemies. 

In this demo, there are five different weeds to face with several different abilities and attacks, as well as a 10 different weapons to use and test.  This all is to serve for the developers as feedback and general testing of the game to see what needs to be worked on, added, or fixed. 

When the full game is released, there is planned to be much more content. 10 action packed levels with their own theme and soundtracks, many more types of weed, and a story to laugh about and enjoy. 

Please enjoy the game and remember that everything here is subject to change, and if you have any constructive feedback to offer, we would love to hear it and encourage you to share it!

Survey about the game: https://forms.gle/yX6gxY4BfP8aQbwHA

Bug Tracker for the game: https://forms.gle/7Xb8fLQMZPepmUiP9
